titleStmt.title: A discours of husbandrie used in Brabant and Flanders shewing the wonderfull improvement of land there; and serving as a pattern for our practice in this Common-wealth.
titleStmt.author: Weston, Richard, Sir, 1591-1652.
Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: The dedication is signed: Samuel Hartlib.
Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Company Library, London.
